channel.title: [SRL]Monastery Terrorist
channel.description:
[CENTER]The Monastery Terrorist! By: Infantry001 Version 0.7[/CENTER]
That's right, the Monastery Terrorist. It will terrorize those silly little monks to no end. And those legit noobs too :D.
Well, I have decided to create another script. At first, this was for my personal use, but I decided to let the people have it (as long as they post bugs/comments/progress reports ;) ;)). It is a really cool script, and although I haven't tested it much, it should work (in theory =P). Let me know how it goes!
[CENTER][B]Features:[/B][/CENTER]
[ul][*]Amazing Monk Finding! [*]Switches spots inside the Monastery! [*]Heals at Abbot Langley at low health! [*]Bone Picking! [*]Can auto-train pures![/ul]
And now, here's the script! Enjoy, and please post all proggies and bugs, so I may fix them up!
